Summon a part of the Fearscape to intersect with the current level.

Your target and yourself are taken to the Fearscape, trapped there until you end the spell or until your target dies.

While inside, a constant aura of flames will burn both of you (and heal demons) for 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 fire damage.

When the spell ends, only you and the target (if still alive) are taken back to your home plane; all summons are left in the Fearscape. Objects will be moved as well.

This spell has no effect if cast when already inside the Fearscape.

This powerful spell drains 5 vim per turn, ending when it reaches 0; the amount drained increases by one each turn.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
You become a master of your craft, allowing you to focus on a single tool (currently none) to greatly improve its capabilities:

Dart Launcher (Dart Launcher Mastery)

Your darts ignore poison and sleep immunity and waking targets are slowed by 20%, 32%, 37%, 40%, 42% for 4 turns.

Smokescreen (Smokescreen Mastery)

Your Smokescreen is infused with chokedust. Enemies in the smoke take 87, 105, 118, 128, 138 nature damage and may be silenced.

Grappling Hook (Grappling Hook Mastery)

Your grappling hook deals 100% unarmed damage when it hits, plus a further 104, 127, 144, 158, 170 physical and 104, 127, 144, 158, 170 nature damage over 4 turns.

Hidden Blades (Assassinate)

You prime your Hidden Blades to cause bleeding and facilitate the Assassinate ability, which allows you to strike twice for 241%, 266%, 285%, 302%, 316% unarmed damage, hitting automatically while ignoring armor and resistance.

Rogue's Brew (Rogue's Brew Mastery)

Your Rogue's Brew fortifies you for 8 turns, preventing you from dying until you reach -156, -347, -494, -617, -726 life.

The effects depend on this talent's level.

Mastering a new tool places it (and its special effects, as appropriate) on cooldown.
value.name: Master Artificer

value.info_text:
You make a low blow against a sensitive point on the target, dealing 180%, 193%, 202%, 211%, 218% unarmed damage. If your attack hits, the target is left reeling and vulnerable, reducing their physical save by 7, 14, 20, 25, 30 and their stun, blind, confusion and pin immunities to 50% of normal for 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

This effect bypasses saves.
value.name: Dirty Fighting

value2.info_text:
You hit your target doing 45%, 56%, 64%, 70%, 77% damage, trying to stun it instead of damaging it. If your attack hits, the target is stunned for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Stun chance increase with your Accuracy.

If you fail to stun the target (or if it shrugs off the effect), you quickly recover; the use of the skill does not take a turn.
value2.name: Dirty Fighting

value.info_text:
Using a series of tricks and maneuvers, you switch places with your target.

Switching places will confuse your foes, granting you Evasion (50%) for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

While switching places, your weapon(s) will connect with the target; this will not do weapon damage, but on hit effects of the weapons can trigger.
value.name: Switch Place

value.info_text:
You hit your target, doing 145%, 164%, 179%, 191%, 202% damage. If your attack connects, the target is crippled for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, losing 45%, 50%, 53%, 56%, 57% melee, spellcasting and mind speed.

The chance to land the status improves with Accuracy, and the status power improves with Cunning.
value.name: Cripple

value.info_text:
Your quick wit gives you a big advantage against disabled targets, increasing your damage by 4%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% for each disabling effect the target is under, to a maximum of 14%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 34%.

For this purpose, disabling effects are stun, blind, daze, confuse, pin, disarm, cripple and silence.

In addition, for each disabling effect the target is under, your melee attacks have a 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%, 6% (to a maximum of 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18%) chance to inflict a new effect on them (that they do not already have): either disarm, cripple (25% power) or pin for 2 turns.

The chance to further disable the target increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Backstab

value2.info_text:
Your quick wit gives you a big advantage against stunned targets; all your hits will have a 18%, 30%, 41%, 51%, 60% greater chance of being critical.

Also, your melee critical strikes have 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18% chance to stun the target for 3 turns.
value2.name: Backstab

value.info_text:
Throw a cloud of blinding dust in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 cone. Enemies within will be blinded, as well as having their accuracy reduced by 10, 16, 21, 25, 29 and movement speed decreased by 16%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 34% for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The chance to inflict these effects increase with your Accuracy.
value.name: Blinding Powder

value.info_text: Make a painful strike dealing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage that increases the duration of up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 negative effect(s) on the target by 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns. For each negative effect extended this way, the duration of a beneficial effect is reduced by the same amount, possibly canceling it.
value.name: Twist the Knife

value.info_text:
You hit your target, doing 110%, 123%, 132%, 141%, 148% damage. If your attack hits, you gain 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 armour penetration for 6, 8, 9, 10, 10 turns.

The APR will increase with your Cunning.
value.name: Deadly Strikes

value.info_text:
For 5, 7, 9, 11, 13 turns, you put all your will into your blows, adding 8, 23, 44, 63, 80 physical power to each strike.

The effect will improve with your Cunning and Willpower stats.
value.name: Willful Combat

value.info_text:
You have learned to find and hit weak spots. All your strikes have a 3.1%, 5.3%, 6.6%, 7.6%, 8.4% greater chance to be critical hits, and your critical hits do 9.4%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% more damage.

Also, when using knives and throwing knives, you now use your Cunning instead of your Strength for bonus damage.
value.name: Lethality

value2.info_text:
You have learned to find and hit weak spots. All your strikes have a 2.78%, 4.62%, 6.24%, 7.72%, 9.11% greater chance to be critical hits, and your critical hits do 9.1%, 15%, 21%, 26%, 30% more damage.

Also, when using knives, you now use your Cunning instead of your Strength for bonus damage.
value2.name: Lethality

value.info_text:
Focus on a single target and perform a probing attack to find flaws in its defences, striking with your melee weapon(s) for 95%, 101%, 106%, 110%, 114% damage.

For 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns thereafter, your attacks against that target gain 7, 8, 9, 10, 10 (effective) accuracy for each probing strike that missed, plus 13, 16, 18, 20, 21 (effective) bonus weapon damage and 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% additional weapon resistance penetration for each probing strike that hit.

Learning this technique allows you to permanently gain 4, 6, 8, 10, 11 armour penetration with all melee and archery attacks.

The bonuses to accuracy and damage increase with Cunning.
value.name: Expose Weakness

value.info_text:
Become a whirling storm of blades, increasing attack speed by 11%, 18%, 25%, 30%, 36% and causing melee attacks to strike an additional adjacent target other than your primary target for 100% weapon damage.

This talent is exhausting to use, draining 6 stamina each turn.
value.name: Blade Flurry

value.info_text: Your quick wits allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your combat talents (cunning or technique) of tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or less.
value.name: Snap

Learn how to coat your melee weapons, throwing knives, sling and bow ammo with poison, giving your attacks a 26%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% chance to poison the target for 22, 27, 30, 33, 36 nature damage per turn for 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. Every application of the poison stacks, up to a maximum of 91, 109, 123, 134, 144 nature damage per turn.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value.name: Apply Poison

value.info_text: When you kill a creature, all of your poisons affecting it will spread to foes in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
value.name: Toxic Death

value2.info_text: When you kill a creature, all the poisons affecting it will have a 28%, 36%, 44%, 52%, 60% chance to spread to foes in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 3, 3.
value2.name: Toxic Death

value.info_text:
Learn how to enhance your Deadly Poison, adding additional effects. Each level, you will learn a new kind of poison enhancement:

  • Level 1: Numbing Poison
  • Level 2: Insidious Poison
  • Level 3: Crippling Poison
  • Level 4: Leeching Poison
  • Level 5: Volatile Poison

New poison enhancements can also be learned from special teachers in the world.

Also increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 26%, 52%, 78%, 104%, 130%. (The effect varies for each poison.)

Adjusting your weapon coating takes no time and does not break stealth.

You may only have two poison enhancements active at once; applying a third will cause one of the existing ones to be cancelled at random.
value.name: Vile Poisons

value2.info_text:
Learn how to coat your melee weapons, sling and bow ammo with poison. Each level, you will learn a new kind of poison:

  • Level 1: Deadly Poison
  • Level 2: Numbing Poison
  • Level 3: Insidious Poison
  • Level 4: Crippling Poison
  • Level 5: Stoning Poison

New poisons can also be learned from special teachers in the world.

Also increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 26%, 52%, 78%, 104%, 130%. (The effect varies for each poison.)

Coating your weapons in poisons does not break stealth.

You may only have two poisons active at once.

Every time you hit a creature with one of your weapons, you have a 26%, 33%, 39%, 46%, 52% chance to randomly apply one of your active poisons.

The chance to apply a poison lowers if the target is already poisoned.
value2.name: Vile Poisons

value.info_text:
Reduces the duration of all poisons on the target by 50%, but increases their damage by 190%, 218%, 239%, 256%, 270%.

The effect increases with your Cunning.
value.name: Empower Poisons

value.info_text:
You strike your target with your melee or ranged weapon, doing 165%, 184%, 199%, 211%, 222% weapon damage as nature and inflicting additional effects based on your active vile poisons:

Numbing Poison - Reduces global speed by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 5 turns.

Insidious Poison - Applies a standard poison that deals 185, 240, 282, 316, 346 nature damage over 5 turns.

Crippling Poison - Places 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 talents on cooldown for 1, 3, 4, 6, 6 turns.

Leeching Poison - Heals you for 185, 240, 281, 315, 345.

Volatile Poison - Deals a further 111, 144, 169, 190, 207 nature damage to foes in a radius 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 ball.

Learning this talent in addition to the Throwing Knives talent allows you to learn the Venomous Throw talent, which can be used to throw poisoned daggers at your foes, but is put on cooldown when this talent is used.
value.name: Venomous Strike

value2.info_text:
You hit your target, doing nature damage depending on the number of poisons on the target:

  • 0 poisons: 70%, 78%, 85%, 90%, 95%
  • 1 poisons: 150%, 167%, 180%, 191%, 201%
  • 2 poisons: 231%, 256%, 275%, 292%, 306%
  • 3 poisons: 311%, 345%, 371%, 393%, 412%

If you wield a bow or sling you shoot instead.
value2.name: Venomous Strike

value.info_text:
Enhance your Deadly Poison with a stoning agent. Whenever you apply Deadly Poison, you afflict your target with an additional earth-based poison that inflicts 8, 8, 8, 8, 9 nature damage per turn (stacking up to 32, 33, 34, 35, 36 damage per turn) for 4 turns.

After either 13 turns or the poison has run its course (<100% chance, see effect description), the target will be turned to stone for 2 turns.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value.name: Stoning Poison

value.info_text: Enhances your Deadly Poison with a numbing agent, causing the poison to reduce all damage the target deals by 11%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21%.
value.name: Numbing Poison

value2.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a numbing poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Poisoned creatures will deal 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 28% less damage.

The effects scale with your Cunning.
value2.name: Numbing Poison

value.info_text: Enhances your Deadly Poison with an insidious agent, causing it to reduce the healing taken by enemies by 47%, 56%, 64%, 70%, 76%.
value.name: Insidious Poison

value2.info_text:
Coat your weapons with an insidious poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Poisoned creatures have their healing reduced by 37%, 46%, 53%, 58%, 62%.

The effects scale with your Cunning.
value2.name: Insidious Poison

value.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a stoning poison, inflicting 13, 14, 16, 17, 17 nature damage per turn for 11, 9, 8, 7, 7 turns.

When the poison runs its full duration, the victim will turn to stone for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value.name: Stoning Poison

value.info_text: Enhances your Deadly Poison with a crippling agent, giving enemies a 11%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21% chance on using a talent to fail and lose a turn.
value.name: Crippling Poison

value2.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a crippling poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Every time a poisoned creature tries to use a talent, it will have a 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance to fail and lose a turn.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value2.name: Crippling Poison

value.info_text: Enhances your Deadly Poison with a leeching agent, causing it to heal you for 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46% of the damage it does to its target.
value.name: Leeching Poison

value.info_text: Enhances your Deadly Poison with a volatile agent, causing the poison to deal 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% increased damage and damage to all adjacent enemies.
value.name: Volatile Poison

value.info_text: Whenever you apply Deadly Poison, you also apply an unresistable magical poison dealing 20, 26, 35, 43, 50 arcane damage (based on your Magic) each turn. This poison reduces all damage resistance by 10% and poison immunity by 50%.
value.name: Vulnerability Poison

value2.info_text:
Coat your weapons with an arcane poison, inflicting 13, 14, 16, 17, 17 arcane damage per turn for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The resistances of poisoned creatures are reduced by 16%, 21%, 23%, 26%, 27%.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
value2.name: Vulnerability Poison

value.info_text: Your melee and ranged attacks have a 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% chance to inflict a deep, disabling wound inflicting an additional 75% of the damage dealt as a bleed over 10 turns, as well as causing the target to lose 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 16% of a turn (up to once per turn).
value.name: Lacerating Strikes

value2.info_text: Rend your foe with every attack you do. All attacks now have a 25%, 42%, 53%, 60%, 66% chance of inflicting an additional 25%, 29%, 32%, 35%, 37% of your attack's damage in Bleeding damage, divided over ten turns.
value2.name: Lacerating Strikes

value.info_text: Quickly and quietly dash your way to the target square, if it is not blocked by enemies or obstacles. This talent will not break Stealth.
value.name: Nimble Movements

value.info_text:
Your melee and ranged attacks inflict distracting wounds that reduce the target’s critical strike chance by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% for 10 turns.

In addition, your attacks against bleeding targets have a 9%, 15%, 20%, 24%, 28% chance to inflict a painful wound that causes them to forget a random talent for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns. The last effect cannot occur more than once per turn per target.
value.name: Scoundrel's Strategies

value2.info_text:
Learn to take advantage of your enemy's pain.

If your enemy is bleeding and attempts to attack you, their critical hit rate is reduced by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35%, as their wounds make them more predictable.

If you attack a bleeding enemy, there is a 9%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 23% chance that, for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns, they are disabled as you take advantage of openings (reducing their movement speed by 19%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 29% and Accuracy by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22) or anguished as you strike their painful wounds (reducing their Willpower by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22 and their Cunning by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22).

The statistical reductions will increase with your Cunning.
value2.name: Scoundrel's Strategies

value.info_text:
Your abilities in sowing confusion and chaos have reached their peak. Whenever a foe attempts to apply a detrimental physical effect to you, they have a 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% chance to fail. If there is an adjacent enemy to you, you misdirect your foe into applying it to them at 32%, 42%, 50%, 55%, 60% duration.

The chance to apply status effects increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Misdirection

value2.info_text:
Your abilities in sowing confusion and chaos have reached their peak. Now, even your most simple moves confuse your enemies, rendering their offense less effective.

Your Defense increases by 11%, 15%, 19%, 22%, 24%, and enemies have a 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18% chance of targetting a random square within 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 squares of you.

The bonus to Defense will increase with Cunning.
value2.name: Misdirection

value.info_text:
Your Scoundrel's Strategies effect leaves your foes unable to focus on any complex actions, giving them a stacking 3% chance of failure the next time they try to use a talent (to a maximum of 15%, 33%, 39%, 45%, 48%).

If the talent fails, the target fumbles and injures itself, taking 107, 140, 164, 184, 201 physical damage and removing the fumble effect.

The damage dealt increases with your Cunning.
value.name: Fumble

value.info_text:
Enters stealth mode (power 41, 52, 59, 64, 69, based on Cunning), making you harder to detect.

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 4.

Any non-instant, non-movement action will break stealth if not otherwise specified.
value.name: Stealth

value2.info_text:
Enters stealth mode (power 36, 48, 57, 65, 71, based on Cunning), making you harder to detect.

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 4.
value2.name: Stealth

value.info_text:
You have learned how to be stealthy even when in plain sight of your foes. You may attempt to enter stealth regardless of how close you are to your enemies, but success is more likely against fewer opponents that are farther away.

Your chance to succeed is determined by comparing 1.10, 1.79, 2.32, 2.76, 3.16 times your stealth power (currently 7, 12, 16, 19, 21) to the stealth detection of all enemies (reduced by 10% per tile distance) that have a clear line of sight to you.

You always succeed if you are not directly observed.

This resets the cooldown of your Stealth talent, and, if successful, all creatures currently following you will lose track of your position.

You estimate your current chance to hide as 100.0%.
value.name: Hide in Plain Sight

value.info_text:
You are able to perform usually unstealthy actions (attacking, using objects, …) without breaking stealth. When you perform such an action while stealthed, you have a chance to stay hidden.

Success is more likely against fewer opponents and is determined by comparing 0.57, 1.14, 1.58, 1.94, 2.27 times your stealth power (currently 3, 7, 10, 13, 15) to the stealth detection (reduced by 10% per tile distance) of all enemies that have a clear line of sight to you.

Your base chance of success is 100% if you are not directly observed, and good or bad luck may also affect it.

You estimate your current chance to maintain stealth as 100.0%.
value.name: Unseen Actions

value.info_text:
You know how to make the most out of being unseen.

When striking from stealth, your attacks are automatically critical if the target does not notice you just before you land it. (Spell and mind attacks critically strike even if the target notices you.)

Your critical multiplier against targets that cannot see you is increased by up to 18%, 29%, 35%, 40%, 44%. (You must be able to see your target and the bonus is reduced from its full value at range 3 to 0 at range 10.)

Also, after exiting stealth for any reason, the critical multiplier persists for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns (with no range limitation).
value.name: Shadowstrike

value2.info_text:
When striking from stealth, the attack is automatically critical if the target does not notice you just before you land it.

Shadowstrikes do +21%, +43%, +59%, +73%, +86% damage versus a normal critical hit up to 3 grids away and then disminishes to 0% at distance 10.

These bonuses are guaranteed for spell and mind crits even if the target can see you before it hits.
value2.name: Shadowstrike

value.info_text:
You have a special affinity for darkness and shadows.

When standing in an unlit grid, the minimum range to your foes for activating stealth or for maintaining it after a Shadow Dance is reduced by 2, 3, 4, 5, 5.

While stealthed, your life regeneration is increased by 5.9, 7.5, 8.9, 10, 11 (based on your Cunning) and your stamina regeneration is increased by 1.2, 1.7, 2.2, 2.6, 2.9. The regeneration effects persist for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns after exiting stealth, with 5 times the normal life regeneration rate.
value.name: Soothing Darkness

value.info_text:
Your mastery of stealth allows you to vanish from sight at any time.

You automatically enter stealth mode, reset its cooldown, and cause it to not break from unstealthy actions for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. If you were not already stealthed, all enemies in a direct line of sight completely lose track of you.

When your Shadow Dance ends, you must make a stealth check against targets in radius 9, 7, 6, 5, 4 or be revealed.
value.name: Shadow Dance

value.info_text: Your cunning manipulations allow you to use charms (wands, totems and torques) more efficiently, reducing their cooldowns by 14%, 25%, 34%, 40%, 46%.
value.name: Charm Mastery

value.info_text:
You look at your surroundings with more intensity than most people, allowing you to see stealthed or invisible creatures.

Increases stealth detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90 and invisibility detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90.

The detection power increases with your Cunning.
value.name: Piercing Sight

value.info_text:
Your quick wit allows you to see attacks before they land, granting you a 34%, 35%, 36%, 37%, 38% chance to completely evade them and granting you 20, 33, 45, 56, 66 defense for 6, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

Duration increases with Willpower, and chance to evade and defense with Cunning and Dexterity.
value.name: Evasion

value.info_text:
You notice the small things others do not notice, allowing you to "see" creatures in a 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 radius even outside of light radius.

This is not telepathy, however, and it is still limited to line of sight.

Also, your attention to detail increases stealth detection and invisibility detection by 49, 64, 73, 81, 87, and you gain the ability to detect traps (+43, +58, +68, +76, +82 detect 'power').

The detection abilities improve with Cunning.
value.name: Heightened Senses

value2.info_text:
You notice the small things others do not notice, allowing you to "see" creatures in a 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 radius even outside of light radius.

This is not telepathy, however, and it is still limited to line of sight.

Also, your attention to detail allows you to detect traps around you (63, 90, 110, 127, 142 detection 'power').

At level 3, you learn to disarm known traps (63, 90, 110, 127, 142 disarm 'power').

The trap detection and disarming ability improves with your Cunning.
value2.name: Heightened Senses

value.info_text:
Your cunning manipulations allow you to use charms (wands, totems and torques) more efficiently, reducing their cooldowns and the power cost of all usable items by 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46%.

In addition your knowledge of devices allows you to disarm known traps (50, 69, 81, 91, 99 disarm 'power', improves with Cunning).
value.name: Device Mastery

value.info_text:
Sense foes around you in a radius of 30, 41, 49, 55, 62 for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
